name: democracy
description: Node.js unicast discovery, master-slave elections and pub/sub.
author: James Simpson <james@goldfirestudios.com> (http://goldfirestudios.com)

scripts.release: VERSION=`printf 'v' && node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'` && git tag $VERSION && git push && git push origin $VERSION && npm publish
